I had a quick breakfast here, it's a Dominican food and it's not bad.
They have really good chicken. I love the food here. I always like getting the lunch deal. On holidays or events we get the combo deals that offer a ton of assorted things for a cheap price.
Amazing food and very sweet staff. My go to Spanish spot in the neighborhood.
